title: Kalsarp Dosh Puja at Trimbakeshwar
summary: Know everything about Kalsarp Dosh, its effects, and the best time to perform this puja.
author: Pandit Ravi Guruji
content: This puja is performed to nullify the negative effects of Rahu and Ketu...
